[DQR.IFRS.0115.9565] The concept ifrs-full:RepaymentsOfBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities with a period duration starting on 2020-06-30 and ending on 2020-09-30 or 92 days with a reported value of 23,482,000 has a value greater than the value of the same element with a longer or equivalent period duration that starts on 2019-12-31 and ends on 2020-12-31 with a value of 20,000,000. The value 23,482,000 for the period of 92 days should be less or the same as the value 20,000,000 with a duration of 366 days assuming that the concept ifrs-full:RepaymentsOfBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities cannot have a negative value. The properties of this ifrs-full:RepaymentsOfBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities fact are: Period :2020-07-01 to 2020-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : EUR
